price: 30. Too cisab aracal kulli nafsi taamoomik tatrussu heemil mokkorimah, maqaané tekkek, umaané tekkek, usun inkih sinni Rabbiy nummâ Yalla kinniy qadaalatal mekla abâ fan gacsiman, Yallak kalah diraabah ginnaasiten yallittey aqbudak sugeeni keenik bay teh.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hunālika tablū kullu nafsin mā aslafat waruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
